actions.name: Dread Wings

cost.trigger: The user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing.

Effect: The user gains 4 Ticks of HP.

actions.name: Dread Wings
actions.description: Passive: The user's Dark-Type attacks are now Super Effective against Fairy-Type creatures.

actions.name: Oblivion Wing
actions.description: Effect: This attack is considered both Flying and Dark Type.

system.description:
Trigger: The user causes a creature to gain @Affliction[fainted] with Oblivion Wing.

Effect: Connection - Oblivion Wing. The user gains 4 Ticks of HP.

Passive: The user's Dark-Type attacks are now Super Effective against Fairy-Type creatures.
